member.name: M:Refit.HttpClientFactoryExtensions.AddRefitClient``1(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection,System.Func{System.IServiceProvider,Refit.RefitSettings})
member.summary: Adds a Refit client to the DI container
member.param: Optional. Action to configure refit settings. This method is called once and only once, avoid using any scoped dependencies that maybe be disposed automatically.
